name: YFEncrypt
summary: The encapsulation of hashing, symmetric encryption, and asymmetric encryption
description:
The encapsulation of hashing, symmetric encryption, and asymmetric encryption.
Hash: MD5, SHA1, SHA224, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512
Symmetric: AES, DES, 3DES, CAST, RC4, RC2, Blowfish
Asymmetric: RSA
